Typography

The theme.fontFamily section of your tailwind.config.js file allows you to override Tailwind's default fontFamily.

For more information see: Tailwind Documentation

Font Family

Class
Properties
Sample
.font-sans -apple-system BlinkMacSystemFont "Segoe UI" Roboto "Helvetica Neue" Arial "Noto Sans" sans-serif "Apple Color Emoji" "Segoe UI Emoji" "Segoe UI Symbol" "Noto Color Emoji"

Font Size (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.text-xs 0.75rem
.text-sm 0.875rem
.text-base 1rem
.text-lg 1.125rem
.text-xl 1.25rem
.text-2xl 1.5rem
.text-3xl 1.875rem
.text-4xl 2.25rem
.text-5xl 3rem
.text-6xl 4rem

Font Weight (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.font-hairline 100
.font-thin 200
.font-light 300
.font-normal 400
.font-medium 500
.font-semibold 600
.font-bold 700
.font-extrabold 800
.font-black 900

Letter Spacing (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.tracking-tighter -0.05em
.tracking-tight -0.025em
.tracking-normal 0
.tracking-wide 0.025em
.tracking-wider 0.05em
.tracking-widest 0.1em

Samples

.tracking-tighter

The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.

.tracking-tight

The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.

.tracking-normal

The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.

.tracking-wide

The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.

.tracking-wider

Line Height (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.leading-none 1
.leading-tight 1.25
.leading-snug 1.375
.leading-normal 1.5
.leading-relaxed 1.625
.leading-loose 2
